import React from 'react' import { API, TRAILER } from '../../constants/constants' import styles from './NowShowing.module.css' export const NowShowing = () => { return (
{TRAILER.PAGE}

{TRAILER.MOVIE}

{TRAILER.DESCRIPTION}

) }
